description:
There`s a new vampire hunter in town, Hinaichi comes for a visit, and Draluc reviews a game.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De Tokyo à Neo-Bayside / Rapport de surveillance d`un Draluc exalté / Quest of Soul Gate : Les chercheurs d`âmes
